CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 30, 1957, pg. 41 reads: "The Guy Woods Sr. Reception - Mr. and Mrs. Guy Woods Sr. of Cincinnati were honored at a 40th wedding anniversary reception, given by their children. The Kay Boys Club in Pittsburgh was chosen for the fete because their two sone make their home in Steel City.  Pictured are the hosts, Mr. and Mrs. Guy Woods Jr. and Mr. and Mrs. James Woods, all of Pittsburgh; Mr. and Mr.s Worley Redmond of Detroit.  Also shown are the Woodses' grandchildren, James, Gregory, David, Don Ricardo and Guy Woods III, all of Pittsburgh, and Maxine Redmond of Detroit.  Some 150 relatives and friends attended the elegant affair. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Mr.and Mrs. Guy Woods Sr., seated, surrounded by family, including Mr. and Mrs. Guy Woods Jr., Mr. and Mrs. James Woods, Mr. and Mrs. Worley Redmond, and grandchildren: James, Gregory, David, Don Ricardo, Guy Woods III, and Maxine Redmond, seated center, posed in Kay Boys Club for fortieth wedding anniversary reception
